DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy biomarker patient interstitial cystitis/painful bladder syndrome
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Biomarker Patient With Interstitial Cystitis/Painful Bladder Syndrome
DOC.criteria: 1 ) must experience bladder pain , urinary urgency urinary frequency , least 6 month prior entry study 2 ) Pain VAS ≥4 3 ) O'LearySant Interstitial Cystitis questionnaire ( ICQ ) symptom problem ≥ 12 ( pain ≥2 , nocturia ≥ 2 ) 4 ) PUF score ≥ 13 5 ) cystoscopic record within 2 year 1 . Patients pregnancy , childbearing age without contraception 2 . Patients void volume < 40 , > 400ml 3 . Patients microscopic hematuria , ( ≥1+ dipstick ) , If exclude evidence neoplastic tumor examination 4 . Patients urine culture show evidence urinary tract infection 1month prior study 5 . Accompanied medical problem Tuberculosis urinary system Bladder cancer , urethral cancer , prostate cancer Recurrent cystitis anatomical disorder 6 . Patients prior surgery ( eq , bladder augmentation , cystectomy 7 . Patients neurologic disorder 8 . Patients indwell catheter intermittent selfcatheterization 9 . Patients psychologic problem
